Package primitives

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
primitives.Point
primitives.Vector
public class Vector extends Point
Vector class will serve as the "upgraded point" to represent direction and size.
Author:
Mendy Welner 209272228. mendiwell@gmail.com Mendy Segal. 211769955.Mendysegal490@gmail.com
